question: Which one of the following is the most fundamental difference between Mahayana Buddhism and Hinayana Buddhism?
explanation: This sect of Buddhism believes in the heavenliness of Buddha and believes in Idol Worship. It allows salvation through having faith and committing oneself to Buddha. Major difference between Hinayana and Mahayana. Mahayana worships the bodhisattvas and read the Mahayana sutras while Hinayanists do not perform these.
